name: Lenny & the island
description:
No download or plug-in is required. Thanks to WebGL you are able to play the game directly in your browser.

You play as Lenny and your goal is to collect as many diamonds as possible and reach the treasure which is near the white tower on the hill and all you have to do in order to reach the tower is to jump on platforms and not fall into the water.

This game was made for a school project.
